Engine2D Is Deprecated

December 21, 2015

I've recently realized that the way I initially wrote Engine2D is terrible (one big namespace? Really?)

So, I've made an alternative. Meet E2D. Unline Engine2D, E2D is not contained in a single source file; rather, E2D is built by gulp, concatenating its many source files.

I started trying to fix my mistakes in Engine2D's devel branch, but I knew it was too late. Besides, there are numerous problems with that branch's approach as well.

TL;DR: Engine2D sucks, E2D is better.
